overview:
Cosplay Shopper is one of the largest suppliers of cosplay costumes on the net. In addition to offering cosplay costumes, wigs and accessories, we provide wholesale pricing on all popular cosplay costumes as well.

From Japanese anime to popular video game characters, Cosplay Shopper carries them all! We have several talented designers and years costume production experience. The lowest price is not we are chasing. It’s the result due to the hard works we put in this business. We know how much you care about cosplay and how important a quality cosplay costume can be!

Customer satisfaction is everything to us. And customer support and service is always the engine that drives our business. It is for this reason we have the most extensive live support chat hours in the industry. We care your shopping experience and believe communication can make things better. So please feel free to contact us whether you have questions about specific products or suggestions for our store. We will be happy to hear from you.
